children.text: Would you like to find accommodation right by the University of Illinois campus in Urbana? Then this city hotel is ideally placed for you! It is situated on Highway 45, only 20 minutes' walk from the railway station. Whether you want to play golf or picnic with your friends, the greenery of the Busey Woods nature reserve will guarantee that you relax and unwind (2. 5 kilometres away).
Hampton Inn Champaign-Urbana-At Univ of Ill

Enjoy the superb services in the Hampton Inn Champaign/Urbana. Rooms with classic furnishings offer modern amenities such as complimentary Wi-Fi access. For your conference or meeting, use the event facilities.

• Total number of rooms 130
 • Number of suites (separate rooms) 14
 • Hotel
 • Hotel built in 1995
 • Last complete renovation 2011
 • Number of floors 4
